channel.title: Project Guthix - OldSchool [Emulous]
channel.description:
[left]Project Guthix[/left]
[B]Story[/B] [I]Well, i miss, the oldschool pking, and the whole concept. I miss the old days, the day without a limite in the trades. I miss the days, where we could actuelly, get the items, we killed for.
So i've thought about remaking, apart of that. using emulous as base. I'm not saying, it's gonna be a completly remake, i'm not gonne copy it all.[/I]
[B]Minigames[/B] [I]Yes! I am gonna create minigames, to gain either items, or exp. I'm gonna bring back minigames such as[/I] [B]Caste wars, Pest Control, Fight Pits, Fight caves..[/B]
- [b]Client[/b] Whip emote C'bow emote
- [b]Ancient altar[/b] Altar to switch from ancient, to modern
- [b]Mage bank[/b] Pull lever Slash web
- [b]Dark wizard[/b] Throwing magic Using eath runes
- [b]PvP following[/b] Following the player, whitout stopping up Attacking from a distance with range Specials while following Projecttiles following you, with range
- [b]Fixed common dupes[/b] Fixed the main "dupes" x Fixed Dropping dupe Fixed duel dupe Fixed trading dupe
- [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul]Woodcutting timer Stumps Growing again
- [b]Combat after one week, of rewritting[/b] Fixed eating timers, before you could hit and eat on the same time Fixed pvp following Mage Following Autocast Correct mage delays and timers rewritten range max hit formulars Rewritten defence formulars Barrows effects Can't cast an spell, from an long distance, it will run to the victim
[b]New combat vid[/b]: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I5wvVQI2MNU&feature=related - Sorry for the lagg, making a new one soon.
- [b]Autocast [/b] - 100% - [b]Mage running to victim[/b] - 100%
Videos
- [b]King black dragon[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O16nYlO6JWY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O16nYlO6JWY[/url]
- [b]Woodcutting[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDKc6QTJWdk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDKc6QTJWdk[/url]
- [b]PvP following[/b] [b]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dd8jwbwnSd0&feature=related[/b]
- [B]Dark wizards[/B]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23wjy9h.png[/img]
-[B]Green dragons[/B]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33bd1s8.png[/img][/ul]

item.dc:creator: @haxifix haxifix
item.description:
@haxifix wrote:

If they don’t understand what you are saying, which is clearly stated in the post, then don’t explain it to them. Also, good job, this looks like its going to be a fun server. I am interested in joining this project if you allow me to. Please send me a PM or MSN at staplesarereal@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Project Guthix - OldSchool [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @savanah savanah
item.description:
@savanah wrote:

licorish55:

Then why did you say it took a week?

I’ve mentioned, like 3 things above.

This is what i did in one week.
Fixed eating timers, before you could hit and eat on the same time - like 20 minutes
Fixed pvp following - atleast 3 days, to fix it fully.
Mage Following - 1 hour or so
Autocast - 30 minutes
Correct mage delays and timers - 1-2 days to figure this.
rewritten range max hit formulars - for all formulars took me atleast 1 day max (include defence formulars
Barrows effects - Ehh 10 minutes
Can’t cast an spell, from an long distance, it will run to the victim - few hours

Read full topic

item.title: Project Guthix - OldSchool [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @savanah savanah
item.description:
@savanah wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:8, topic:320788”]I’m saying that week it took you…
You could of been working on something different to benefit your server.

Just saying.[/quote]

Emulous already had pretty good combat, i’ve just fixed it up, and rewrote some max hit formulars.

Rewrote the defence system, witch took me around 1 and a half hour.

Autocast took me like 30 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Guthix - OldSchool [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @savanah savanah
item.description:
@savanah wrote:

[left]Project Guthix[/left]

Story
[I]Well, i miss, the oldschool pking, and the whole concept.
I miss the old days, the day without a limite in the trades.
I miss the days, where we could actuelly, get the items, we killed for.

So i’ve thought about remaking, apart of that. using emulous as base.
I’m not saying, it’s gonna be a completly remake, i’m not gonne copy it all.[/I]

Minigames
Yes! I am gonna create minigames, to gain either items, or exp.
I’m gonna bring back minigames such as Caste wars, Pest Control, Fight Pits, Fight caves…

  • Client
    Whip emote
    C’bow emote

  • Ancient altar
    Altar to switch from ancient, to modern

  • Mage bank
    Pull lever
    Slash web

  • Dark wizard
    Throwing magic
    Using eath runes

  • PvP following
    Following the player, whitout stopping up
    Attacking from a distance with range
    Specials while following
    Projecttiles following you, with range

  • Fixed common dupes
    Fixed the main “dupes” x
    Fixed Dropping dupe
    Fixed duel dupe
    Fixed trading dupe

  • Woodcutting

[ul]Woodcutting timer
Stumps
Growing again

  • Combat after one week, of rewritting
    Fixed eating timers, before you could hit and eat on the same time
    Fixed pvp following
    Mage Following
    Autocast
    Correct mage delays and timers
    rewritten range max hit formulars
    Rewritten defence formulars
    Barrows effects
    Can’t cast an spell, from an long distance, it will run to the victim

New combat vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I5wvVQI2MNU&feature=related - Sorry for the lagg, making a new one soon.

  • Autocast - 100%
  • Mage running to victim - 100%

Videos

  • King black dragon
    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O16nYlO6JWY

  • Woodcutting
    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDKc6QTJWdk

  • Dark wizards

-Green dragons

[/ul]
